author: sachinvgaikwad
body: I have installed powershell on my Ubuntu system i tried to install Azure module it didn't work can you help me out with this

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Did you install **AzureRM.NetCore.Preview, AzureRM.Profile.NetCore.Preview and AzureRM.Resources.NetCore.Preview** as mentioned in 
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/demos/Azure#prerequisites ?

The regular Azure modules are not CoreCLR-compatible and so can work only on inbox windows powershell.

title: powershell / azure module
